Package javax.constraints.impl.search.goal

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Dichotomize
    This class is used by the Solver's method "findOptimalSolutionDichotomize".
    Goal
    This is a base implementation for a goal.
    GoalAddSolution
    This goal adds a newly found solution to the array of solutions available via getSolutions()
    GoalApplySolution
    This goal is trying to resolve the problem using a solution passed as a parameter.
    GoalAssignValue  
    GoalAssignValues  
    GoalAssignValuesTimeLimit  
    GoalAssignValueTimeLimit  
    GoalBacktrack
    This goal forces the solver to backtrack
    GoalCheckMaxNumberOfSolutions
    This goal is used inside solveAll() to stop or continue the search.
    GoalCheckTimeLimit
    This goal checks if time limit exceeded and if yes it forces solver to backtrack.
    GoalCheckTotalTimeLimit
    This goal checks if total time limit (in seconds) for solveAll() is exceeded and fails if yes.
    GoalConstraint  
    GoalLog  
    GoalLogSolution  
    GoalPrint  
    GoalSaveSolution  
    ReversibleActionGoal  
    SolverWithGoals  
    StrategyAsGoal
